name: John Doe
summaryText: Experienced developer with over 3 years of experience in designing and implementing scalable web applications. Proficient in both front-end and back-end development, with a strong focus on React and Express. Known for delivering robust solutions that enhance user experience and streamline business operations.
stackList: Bootstrap, Tailwind, SASS, LESS, CSS modules
ES6+, Next.js, React.js, React Styled components, React-redux (+toolkit), Node.js (Express.js, MongoDB)
projectsSectionSummary: Over the past few years, I have participated in several projects and built some on my own (including this CV). Here are a few:

project_1.title: Project A
project_1.subtitle: Developed with React.js (TypeScript) and Google Cloud Platform (Google Auth & Firestore). Users input data along with a 'secret key,' which is then encoded and stored in the database.

project_2.title: Project B
project_2.subtitle: Developed with React.js and Sass in a black-and-white color scheme. Users can search, select a language, hover over elements for descriptions, and click to read articles.

project_3.title: Project C
project_3.subtitle: A quiz app built with React.js and Bootstrap (default styles). Users can press 'Start' to answer 10 randomly generated questions.

experienceSubtitle: I have previously held various roles in different industries, most of which were not directly related to software development.

experiencePeriodLatest.brief: Developing high-performance online stores and personal websites tailored to client needs. Leveraging modern tech stacks, primarily Next.js with Sanity.io or Supabase, to create seamless, scalable, and visually compelling digital experiences.

experiencePeriodPrevious.brief: Developing landing pages, web portfolios, and web applications of any complexity. Experienced in 'Pixel Perfect' methodology, with a strong focus on flexibility and accessibility by default.
